item.description: 《OpenGL 4 Shading Language Cookbook, Second Edition》 书中的代码： https://github.com/daw42/glslcookbook 术语解释： GLEW (OpenGL Extension Wrangler). GLM (OpenGL Mathematics) GLFW is an Open Source, multi-platform library for OpenGL, OpenGL ES and Vulkan development on the desktop. It provides a simple API for creating windows, contexts and surfaces, receiving input and events.
